entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Halton Hills
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:29 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Snow, -2.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Toronto Pearson Int'l Airport 10:14 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
Condition: Snow
Temperature: -2.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.6 kPa falling
Visibility: 0.8 km
Humidity: 100 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -2.2°C
Wind: NNW 16 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 4

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow ending late this afternoon then cloudy. Amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 7 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Cloudy. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries late in the morning and in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
